title: Retrieve the Kraken
description: On a particularly blustery Balloon Festival day, Thomas is tasked with retrieving any balloons that start to drift away. When the Kraken-shaped balloon soars off, the chase is on! However, each of Thomas' friends see the hovering balloon in brief moments, bolstering the rumor that there's an actual sea monster loose on the island! It's up to Thomas to calm his friends down and retrieve the balloon in time for the festival.
seriesname: Thomas and Friends: All Engines Go
originalseriesname: Thomas and Friends: All Engines Go
